description: Part A: Participate in psychological research via SONA system (4% compulsory, up to 4% bonus). Part B: Attend Week 5 tutorial to discuss research design and submit peer feedback (4%).

Part A: Complete 3 online modules on academic integrity, writing, and media (3%). Part B: Write a research summary of an academic article (7%). Part C: Develop a research proposal with literature review and rationale (40%).
Exam during UNSW exam period covering lectures, tutorials, and course materials. Tests understanding of theoretical approaches, research evaluation, and real-world applications.
